mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into business_log (action_type, opr_no, refer_id, user_id, trace_id, opr_table_name,extend_content,sys_name) values (#{actionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oprNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{traceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oprTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update business_log set action_type = #{actionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opr_no = #{oprNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refer_id = #{referId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trace_id = #{traceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opr_table_name = #{oprTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_datetime = #{actionDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, extend_content = #{extendContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, sys_name = #{sysName} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, action_type, opr_no, refer_id, user_id, trace_id, opr_table_name, action_datetime, gmt_create, gmt_modified, extend_content from business_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, action_type, opr_no, refer_id, user_id, trace_id, opr_table_name, action_datetime, gmt_create, gmt_modified, extend_content from business_log

select bl.id, bl.action_type, bl.opr_no, bl.refer_id, bl.user_id, bl.trace_id, bl.opr_table_name, bl.action_datetime, bl.extend_content,ai.action_name from business_log bl left join action_item ai on bl.action_type = ai.id where refer_id = #{orderNo}

select bl.id, bl.action_type, bl.opr_no, bl.refer_id, bl.user_id, bl.trace_id, bl.opr_table_name, bl.action_datetime, bl.extend_content,ai.action_name from business_log bl left join action_item ai on bl.action_type = ai.id where refer_id = #{orderNo} and sys_name = #{sysName}
